column4: i just upgraded from dapper to edgy, but now firefox doesn't work.
like i click the icon and it looks like its trying to load but then it just shutsdown
what program unexpected quits?
firefox
with FP9?
i dont know, how do i check the verison?
how do i check?
open browser and type  about:config  then look down at very bottom which you have FP version
i cant even open the browser
it says like its loading but then it just closes
do you know how to fix?
FP 9 have bugs, you can move the libflashplayer.so out of plugin directory to the backup directory then you can try open FF
ok ill try that
where is it located?
Places > Home > (show hidden in menu list TICKED in) and look for .mozilla folder and look for plugins.. then move the libflashplayer.so to backup directory.
my breezy looks bad shape right now, I'm waiting for LTS 6.06 come in from the order online..
doesnt work
PwcrLinux,
it doesnt work
what shoould i do?
or you can do in the terminal box,   locate libflashplayer.so   make sure it's says /mozilla/plugins  then  mv libflashplayer.so to desktop or whatever you want to move to back up folder..
